div.div: Coming Soon – New Freestanding Homes with Open - Concept Layouts and Upgraded Finishes. Learn more.

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, leisure, culture and opportunity, Avalon offers you a wonderful selection of San Dimas apartments. Inside our refreshing community, you'll find thoughtfully-designed one- and two- bedroom apartment homes. Imagine entertaining in well-appointed kitchens with ENERGY STAR® black appliances, granite countertops and contemporary lighting. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, and smart technology and services including electronic locks, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a sparkling swimming pool, and a beautifully landscaped green belt with outdoor seating, barbecue and a tot lot. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. SAN DIMAS APARTMENTS BY AVALON When you choose to live at Avalon San Dimas, you will discover a world of entertainment and leisure right at your doorstep. Explore San Dimas during your free time and check out popular attractions like Frank G. Bonelli Regional Park, Morris Reservoir, and San Gabriel Dam. With shopping and dining venues around the corner, there is plenty to keep you occupied on weekends and holidays. The dynamic city also has a lot more to offer. The easy access to Freeways 210 and 57 makes getting around all of Los Angeles County a piece of cake. SAN DIMAS APARTMENT COMMUNITY In addition to the amazing features and amenities, you will also have guaranteed access to the Avalon Advantage. This is a special program designed to benefit all our residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. Don't waste any more time! Click the Contact Us button below and discover the best San Dimas apartments in California today! Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

Live Up."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}}]},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityDescription","id":"f0fIVvEcWvMb2o7","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"Make Yourself at Home","description":"We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience, leisure, culture and opportunity, Avalon offers you a wonderful selection of San Dimas apartments. Inside our refreshing community, you'll find thoughtfully-designed one- and two- bedroom apartment homes. Imagine entertaining in well-appointed kitchens with ENERGY STAR® black appliances, granite countertops and contemporary lighting. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, and smart technology and services including electronic locks, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, a sparkling swimming pool, and a beautifully landscaped green belt with outdoor seating, barbecue and a tot lot. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. SAN DIMAS APARTMENTS BY AVALON When you choose to live at Avalon San Dimas, you will discover a world of entertainment and leisure right at your doorstep. Explore San Dimas during your free time and check out popular attractions like Frank G. Bonelli Regional Park, Morris Reservoir, and San Gabriel Dam. With shopping and dining venues around the corner, there is plenty to keep you occupied on weekends and holidays. The dynamic city also has a lot more to offer. The easy access to Freeways 210 and 57 makes getting around all of Los Angeles County a piece of cake. SAN DIMAS APARTMENT COMMUNITY In addition to the amazing features and amenities, you will also have guaranteed access to the Avalon Advantage. This is a special program designed to benefit all our residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. Don't waste any more time! Click the Contact Us button below and discover the best San Dimas apartments in California today!
